sense.def: Abbreviated Designation nu 弩 ; Alternative Writing nu rou 努肉.

① Pathological Condition with the growth of a redundant fleshy object reminiscent of an insect wing developing from the canthi towards the dark part of the eye as a major sign. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry que shi 雀屎：和男首子乳如薄泥，點目中，弩肉、赤脈貫瞳 子上者即消 , “Mix with the milk for a first male child to prepare a thin paste and swab into the eye. Tumorous flesh-growth and red vessels pervading the surface of the pupil will then dissolve”.

② Pathological Item of flesh tissue protruding from sores and ulcers. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 61: 治諸瘡瘥後， 瘡瘢弩肉未消 , “It cures, in the scars following the healing of any type of sore, tumorous flesh-growth failing to dissolve”.
